title: Dungeon Spirit
summaries: The Dungeon Spirit is a flying Hardmode enemy that spawns in the post-Plantera Dungeon. It can travel through walls and drops Ectoplasm, which can be used to craft many Spectre-related items.

When defeating any enemy with more than 100 maximum health in a Hardmode post-Plantera Dungeon there is a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/13 (7.69%) / 1/9 (11.11%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/15 (6.67%) chance of a Dungeon Spirit spawning. Besides, the enemy defeated must be in front of an unsafe dungeon wall to spawn a Dungeon Spirit. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the enemy must also drop coins, meaning statue-spawned and Old One's Army enemies do not spawn Dungeon Spirits.
